description:
From the master of horror manga, this anthology series shines a light on many of Junji Ito`s twisted stories, starting with introducing the gloomy, curse-obsessed Souichi. Then, in the second story, a strange plague forces a couple to make a difficult decision about their child.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Souichi no Katte na Noroi / Jigoku no Ningyou Sou
Souichi`s Convenient Curse / Hell Doll Funeral
双一の勝手な呪い / 地獄の人形葬
